API description: Get every earthquake and any other event that registers on the richter scale ever catalogued by the USGS, with very detailed location data.

API method.API method description: Get the 100 most recent earthquakes from all over in the world. No parameters required.

API method parameters.name: units
API method parameters.description:
Either miles or kilometers for the radius of the search circle.
Search for earthquakes near a certain location using latitude, longitude, radius and units. All four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, longitude, radius, units: all four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

API method parameters.name: latitude
API method parameters.description:
The latitude portion of the point at the center of the search circle.
Search for earthquakes near a certain location using latitude, longitude, radius and units. All four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, longitude, radius, units: all four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

API method parameters.name: intensity
API method parameters.description: Intensity can be added to limit results to only those earthquakes with at least the specified intensity or greater.

API method parameters.name: type
API method parameters.description: Type can be added to limit results to only those types specified, e.g.: earthquakes, quarry blasts, explosions. Use the 'types' endpoints to see all available types.

API method parameters.name: magnitude
API method parameters.description: Magnitude can be added to limit results to only those earthquakes with at least the specified magnitude or greater.

API method parameters.name: radius
API method parameters.description:
The length across half a circle of the search area. The latitude and longitude together make up the center of the circle, while the radius is the distance from the center to the outside of the circle. A 10 mile radius will be a circle 20 miles across with its center at the latitude/longitude point.
Search for earthquakes near a certain location using latitude, longitude, radius and units. All four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, longitude, radius, units: all four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

API method parameters.name: count
API method parameters.description:
Add to any call to limit the number of earthquakes returned.
100 earthquakes are returned by default, up to 1000 earthquakes can be returned using the 'count' parameter.

API method parameters.name: longitude
API method parameters.description:
The longitude portion of the point at the center of the search circle.
Search for earthquakes near a certain location using latitude, longitude, radius and units. All four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

constraints.inter-dependency: latitude, longitude, radius, units: all four properties must be included when retrieving earthquakes near a certain location.

API method parameters.name: start
API method parameters.description:
Use the 'start' parameter to retrieve more than 1000 earthquakes, up to 1000 at a time. 'Start' is the offset to start at within the overall results.
100 earthquakes are returned by default, up to 1000 earthquakes can be returned using the 'count' parameter.
